segments.text: This is the place I was telling you about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to sit near the window ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's have a look at the menu . Oh , there isn't a menu . Do you think you could ask the people at the next table if we could look at their menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . Excuse me . Could you possibly let us see your menu ? Oh . They haven't got one either .
segments.speaker: S2
